item.title: TIL: Debugging frozen JVM
item.description: When kill -3 <pid> and jconsole <pid> don’t work as vm froze it is still possible to get some info about the process. gdb -p <pid> (gdb) generate-core-file Saved corefile core.<pid> (gdb) quit To extract the stacktrace: jhsdb jstack \ --exe /home/jrubin/.sdkman/candidates/java/current/bin/java \ --core core.<pid> To extract the heap dump: jhsdb jmap --binaryheap \ --dumpfile dump.hprof \ --exe /home/jrubin/.sdkman/candidates/java/current/bin/java \ --core core.<pid> Note that jhsbd jmap took couple of minutes to run.
